metadata.name: Charle Ray's Psychedelic Trip
metadata.description:
In a visit to Pompideu Museum, I found Charles Ray "Self-Portrait" so inspirational that I started following his whole work. 

I read Anthony Marasco noted his work as paratextual: or, paraphrasing Genett: “meaningful deceptions”: deceptions that engender meaning by overdriving interpretation."

As a Techno philosopher and artist myself. I found AI tools like the best choice to manifest this idea. Since I walked into that gallery, I felt bedazzled by the scenery and I read that he -Charles Ray- liked psychedelics as part of his experimentation. 

The idea here was to actually represent this meaningful deception, this overdriven interpretation, using a fictional landscape where this statue or three-dimensional self-portrait would inhabit.

I used Dalle-2 for the prompt, GIMP to edit some chaotic things & a post process filter.

1/1.
